College CAP

Let College CAP help you determine college affordability!

Find Out More

Experience That Works For You!

We are experienced financial aid professionals that have many years of experience working at various post-secondary institutions. We understand the complexities of college financial aid models and how to help college bound students determine where they fit, in fact some cases we created those models.

It is our mission to guide families to make financially healthy decisions that will lead to a prosperous future, rather than digging out of student loan debt. While there are many choices out there, we believe that getting the help you need to make a wise financial decision shouldn’t break the bank. Our services are geared to be personalized and low-cost.

Interested in finding out more about how we can help you? Reach out to us and find out through our free consultation.

At Your Service

Affordability Assessment

We work with clients to truly understand what they can afford to pay for college.

College List Assistance

Let us help you build a list of schools that you can afford without getting in cripling debt.

Application Assistance

Whether you have question about the FAFSA or the CSS Profile, we make it stress free.

Personalized Meetings

One on One meetings designed for you and your family's situation.

Family Expenses

Includes Mortgage and Rent Payments.

Includes Medical, Home, Renters, Auto and Life Insurance, etc.

Includes revolving or monthly payments to credit cards, personal loans, loan consolidation/repayment, Federal PLUS loans for older siblings, etc., not factored into another Family Expense category.

Includes grocery, restaurants, delivery, take out and warehouse memberships.

Includes electricity, water, heating fuel, cell phone plans, Wi-Fi , satellite or cable connectivity and any subscription service (NETFLIX, AppleTV, etc.)

Includes gasoline, road tolls, ride-shares, public transportation, parking, snow removal, licensing, registration and car maintenance.

Includes Daycare, Eldercare, School or Course Work, Tuition and fees.
